# pds-list-options



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property                   | Attribute              | Description                                     | Type     | Default     |
| -------------------------- | ---------------------- | ----------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `componentId` _(required)_ | `component-id`         | A unique identifier for the sortable container. | `string` | `undefined` |
| `focusedOptionIndex`       | `focused-option-index` | Track the currently focused option index        | `number` | `-1`        |
| `selectedOptionId`         | `selected-option-id`   | Store the ID of the last selected option        | `string` | `undefined` |
